mapper.select: SELECT hm.*, mf.FILE_NO, mf.FILE_URL, mf.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, mf.FILE_RENAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, admin.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_FILE mf ON hm.MESSAGE_NO = mf.MESSAGE_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON hm.SENDER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER admin ON hm.RECEIVER_NO = admin.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY NVL(hm.REPLY_DATE, hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE) DESC, hm.MESSAGE_NO DESC

SELECT hm.MESSAGE_NO, hm.MESSAGE_TITLE, hm.MESSAGE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, hm.SENDER_NO, hm.RECEIVER_NO, hm.REPLY_YN, hm.REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(hm.REPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REPLY_DATE, mf.FILE_NO, mf.FILE_URL, mf.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, mf.FILE_RENAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, admin.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_FILE mf ON hm.MESSAGE_NO = mf.MESSAGE_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON hm.SENDER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER admin ON hm.RECEIVER_NO = admin.MEMBER_NO WHERE hm.MESSAGE_NO = #{messageNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE HELP_MESSAGE SET REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, REPLY_YN = 'Y', REPLY_DATE = SYSDATE, RECEIVER_NO = #{receiverNo} WHERE MESSAGE_NO = #{messageNo}
mapper.select: SELECT hm.*, mf.FILE_NO, mf.FILE_URL, mf.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, mf.FILE_RENAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, admin.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_FILE mf ON hm.MESSAGE_NO = mf.MESSAGE_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON hm.SENDER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER admin ON hm.RECEIVER_NO = admin.MEMBER_NO WHERE hm.REPLY_YN = 'N' AND hm.SENDER_NO != #{adminId} ORDER BY hm.MESSAGE_NO DESC

SELECT hm.MESSAGE_NO, hm.MESSAGE_TITLE, hm.MESSAGE_CONTENT, hm.MESSAGE_WRITE_DATE, hm.SENDER_NO, hm.RECEIVER_NO, hm.REPLY_YN, hm.REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(hm.REPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REPLY_DATE, mf.FILE_NO, mf.FILE_URL, mf.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, mf.FILE_RENAME, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, admin.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM HELP_MESSAGE hm LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_FILE mf ON hm.MESSAGE_NO = mf.MESSAGE_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON hm.SENDER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER admin ON hm.RECEIVER_NO = admin.MEMBER_NO WHERE hm.RECEIVER_NO = #{adminId} AND hm.REPLY_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY hm.REPLY_DATE DESC, hm.MESSAGE_NO DESC
